features: INSTANT BACK PAIN RELIEF CHAIR PILLOW: This office chair cushion offers ergonomic design to promote proper posture, relieve pressure and provide necessary chair back support for a comfortable workday
POSTURE BACK SUPPORT CUSHION: Enjoy optimal posture with our contoured lumbar support pillow for office chair. The extended sides and gentle curve hug your back, preventing pain while sitting
DUAL ADJUSTABLE STRAPS: With the included strap extension, the lumbar pillow can fit chairs up to 32" (81cm) wide and can be easily removed from smaller chairs for a perfect and secure fit every time
CERTIFIED SAFE and DURABLE: Our car seat back support has passed rigorous testing and is OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 certified. Invest in a quality Everlasting Comfort Seat Cushion with confidence
COOL and COMFORTABLE: The 3D polyester mesh cover on the back support office chair promotes breathability, keeping you cool during long hours of sitting
LUMBAR CHAIR SUPPORT PROVIDES CONSISTENT COMFORT: Our desk chair back support won’t flatten, providing the same feel use after use thanks to its slow rebounding, heat responsive memory foam
PORTABLE and CONVENIENT: Transforms any chair; Ideal as a back support pillow for chair, lumbar support pillow for car or couch, desk chair pillow for back, and as a lumbar support for gaming chair
PREVENTS BACK PAIN DEVELOPING OVER TIME: Take proactive measures now to prevent back pain from developing in the future by using our lumbar support for office chair

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sitting Without Back Pain is Possible with the Everlasting Comfort Back Cushion Get the best in back support and comfort with our Lumbar Support Pillow. Whether you’re taking a road trip, traveling, pulling an all-nighter on a paper, or trying to meet a deadline at work, our chair back cushion provides your back with the support it needs to keep back pain at bay.

Previous page Back Cushion for Office Chair Heat responsive memory foam provides the perfect soft, but firm density for support and comfort Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair Curved to match the natural shape of your spine, it adapts to and hugs your back where needed most Chair Back Support Place the lumbar cushion anywhere along the chair's back and securely attach it with the straps Back Support Pillow The breathable cover allows heat to escape, keeping you cool without any embarrassing back sweats Next page 1 Premium Memory Foam 2 Ergonomic Curved Design 3 Dual Adjustable Straps 4 Breathable Washable Cover
The Lumbar Support You Need to Achieve Total Comfort and Overall Well-Being

Say Goodbye to Bad Posture and Back Pain Once and for All Proper lumbar support for your back’s natural curves goes a long way to reducing back tension and pressure. Our ergonomically designed back cushion is curved to allow you to sit up with the comfort and support needed to reduce slouching and improve overall sitting posture.

Fits All Chair Types Versatile, it can be used on office chairs, gaming chairs, car seats, airplane seats and any other chair up to 32" (81cm) wide Easy to Install While most low quality lumbar pillows offer just one flimsy strap, our dual adjustable straps can be secured tightly to prevent your office chair cushion from falling or sliding Made with Certified Safe Materials In our commitment to providing you with the highest quality items, our lumbar cushion has been tested by OEKO-TEX to earn the coveted STANDARD 100 label meaning every component is certified safe

Check Out Other Products By Everlasting Comfort Rest Your Feet In Luxury Add to Cart Sit Without Tailbone Pain Add to Cart Work Without Wrist Pain Add to Cart Upgrade Your Gaming Setup Add to Cart Drive In Total Comfort Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.6 out of 5 stars 26,821 4.4 out of 5 stars 131,769 4.6 out of 5 stars 2,162 4.7 out of 5 stars 929 4.3 out of 5 stars 18,348 Price $33.99$33.99 $37.99$37.99 $19.99$19.99 $14.99$14.99 $31.99$31.99 Material Memory Foam Memory Foam Memory Foam Micro Texture Cloth Surface Memory Foam Features Doubles as a foot rocker U shaped coccyx cutout Keyboard wrist pad included 15 color modes U-shaped coccyx cutout Ideal For Feet, legs, lower back Tailbone, lower back, legs For all mouse & keyboard types All mouse and keyboard types Tailbone, lower back, legs Dimensions 17”x5”x10” 17.5”x14”x2.75” 9"x10.6" , 17"x3"x1" 31.5”x11.8” 17”x13”x3” Machine Washable ✔ ✔ ✘ ✘ ✔

Benefits of a back cushion? Back support pillows help bridge the gap between the comfort and support your current chair lacks. Our back cushion contours around the natural curve of your spine to lessen discomfort, improve your sitting posture, and reduce sitting fatigue. Can chairs cause back pain? Most chairs are designed with a straight back. This leads to you sitting hunched over, causing pressure and pain in your neck, shoulders, back. Adding a lumbar cushion to your chair is an easy, affordable way to upgrade your uncomfortable seat. Are back cushions healthy? If you often have pain in your back, neck, or shoulders, a back pillow can help improve discomfort while sitting. Our back support is designed with premium memory foam to provide a soft, yet firm foundation to support a healthy sitting posture. How to apply this back cushion? Our lumbar support cushion can be placed anywhere on your chair to support your upper, middle, or lower back. Dual adjustable straps ensure it stays in place, even if you shift about. Fits virtually any chair with a maximum width of 32” (81cm). How do you clean the back cushion? Our back support for office chairs features a removable cover that’s easy to clean and keep fresh. Simply unzip the cover from the memory foam, and toss cover into the wash on the gentle cycle. Tumble dry with low heat for best results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have a bad back, you are willing to do a LOT to improve seat comfort, yeah?
reviews.reviewText: I read all the 5-star reviews on this product with some skepticism, but upon receiving it today via Amazon Prime, I was at once impressed. The build quality seemed decent, and as someone else wrote, this memory foam product is the 'goldilocks' of seat cushions... not too firm and not too soft. The included elastic belt/buckle/extension units reached around my new executive chair quite easily, and I was able to adjust the height of this cushion to maximize pressure on my lower back area and thus my discomfort whilst sitting evaporated. I shot a couple of pics so you can see how well this product works and how it attaches to your existing chair. I'm not sure how this would work in an AUTOMOBILE seat as they are quite thick and wide, I did not try it in my car. Everlasting Comfort did a nice job packaging this in a plastic bag with a moisture wicking pad, instruction sheet, and lifetime warranty registration (online) instructions. I was impressed, as the manufacturer even gives their email address and invites you to immediately contact them if there are any issues or defects, and they will directly send you a replacement! That's outstanding, tells me they have confidence in their product. For the small price, I think this is a worthwhile purchase, and speaking as a person who is now dealing with daily chronic sciatic and lower back pain, I regard this item as a very good purchase decision on my part and recommend anyone in similar circumstances to try it. Given Amazon's liberal return policy, why not? I didn't even take it out of the plastic bag until I sat in my chair a bit and tried it out. Note that in my photos, a secondary chair pad (purchased here on Amazon) is shown where you 'sit' - that item is from a different memory foam manufacturer well known for their mattresses. The chair itself is also from that same famous memory foam manufacturer, but the chair did not support my lower back at all, even trying every conceivable adjustment on the chair. So this cushion was a Godsend. Mark me a happy camper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, provides good support. Wish I could tighten it a bit more, but my office chair is on the smaller side. Overall I'm happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thick but effective cushion
reviews.reviewText: This is great lumbar cushion. I agree with some of the reviews that it is a little too thick. I have it on a standard office chair and it seems to push me forward so that it's a bit uncomfortable sitting. My behind doesn't sit clear on the back on my seat and I feel like I'm being pushed forward. However, I moved the cushion up to the very top of the back of my chair and I am able to sit a bit more comfortably and the cushion still makes me arch my back and that is what my goal was. If I were to put the cushion very low, close to the seat, I wouldn't have room to sit on the seat and would only be perched on the edge. The cushion came with an extender which I did not have to use but I appreciated that it had one. Probably good for gaming chairs. I do plan to use this in my car and would most likely use the extender straps. All in all, I recommend this cushion. I do like the fact that I can take the cover off and wash it. It also looks sleek and professional on the back on my chair. Very nice cushion for the price.

reviews.reviewText: Didn't work for computer chair, as it protrudes too much against lower back, but works great on couch while watching TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Seems nice. Delivery was the problem.
reviews.reviewText: This item showed up and seems to works as described. Sadly, it was purchased as a gift. My kids purchased it for their Dad for Christmas, but it showed up at the door in a clear bag. My husband leaving for work, saw it and the entire surprise element of Christmas was ruined. It should have to say in the description whether or not the packing will give it away.The product itself is great quality. Just know it will probably be shipped so the whole world knows what it is.

reviews.reviewText: I drive transit bus and I bought this cushion and I love it. It makes me feel comfortable for a 8 hour shift I take to work everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product was recommend to me. Very happy with this purchase. Have two slipped discs, and a trapped nerve. This cushion provides comfort when sitting, can be adjusted to suit. Great product.

Preso per la mia sedia ergonomica Ikea e adesso non ne posso fare a meno. Il supporto lombare della sedia non era il massimo, con questo cuscino mi trovo davvero bene ed è aumentata di tanto l'ergonomia della seduta. Anche la qualità sembra buona.
